title: S74 Silk Meyers SGC 3 Tough Yellow Color
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: S74 Silk Meyers SGC 3 Tough Yellow Color
posts.post_content:
Offered here is a 1911 S74 Old Mill Silk of Chief Meyers. It is graded a 3 by SGC. It is a tougher Yellow silk color with bold red printing. It does have some fraying but all the threads are still in tack making this a SGC 3. 
124.99 plus 5.99 for shipping SOLD
